title: Quinoa, beetroot and rocket salad
ingredients: ['225g fresh beetroot, peeled and sliced', '170g red quinoa', '475ml water', '120ml olive oil', '120ml red wine vinegar', '1 1/2 teaspoons sugar', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 spring onions, sliced', '85g rocket', '140g goat cheese, crumbled']
